name: Tangled Run
description:
A traveler loses his map while exploring a forest. He suddenly reaches a tribal area, where the native people try to attack him. His main goal is to find a way out of the dangerous area without getting killed by the tribal people who see him as a foreigner.

This project is made by :
Ripunjaya Tak 20BCG10015
George Jose 20BCG10019

Students from VIT Bhopal studying BTech Computer Science with Gaming Technology.
